unparsed_output: Store the product in a cool, well-ventilated area.  Well-suited for alcohol based products, use the emptied container to store any additional cleaning of the container prior to its disposal.  Do not empty container unsuitable for further use, and dispose in accordance with the Provincial requirements.  Dispose of any remaining product at the end of the application in an environmentally responsible manner, and follow all information provided on the label.  Store at room temperature out of reach of children.
